author: Staff Reporter
text:
As part of the 33{+r}{+d}annual celebration of the National Day for Mentally Retarded Persons, the Tambaram Parents’ Association for the Mentally Retarded will organise a series of events including a march past by children from different schools at Shivalayaa, Vels University, Velan Nagar in Pallavaram at 9.30 a.m. on Saturday.

An exhibition on teaching aids for the children, a drawing competition, sports and games and a seminar on the role of society in the welfare of mentally challenged persons will be organised on the Vels University campus.
title: Exhibition, rally on Saturday
